Class WombatWorld

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      WombatWorld

public class WombatWorld
extends greenfoot.World

A world where wombats live. Can populate the world with some leaves, rocks and simpleWombats. You have to change the code a little bit to create objects of subclasses of SimpleWombat.

Version:
1.0.2
Author:
Michael Kolling, changed by Thomas Karp

Constructor Summary
WombatWorld()
          Create a new world with 8x8 cells and with a cell size of 60x60 pixels
 
Method Summary
 void populate()
          Populate the world with a fixed scenario of wombats and leaves.
 void randomLeaves(int howMany)
          Place a number of leaves into the world at random places.
 void randomPopulation(int howManySimpleWombats, int howManyRocks, int howManyLeaves)
          Place a number of simpleWombats, rocks and leaves at random places.
 void randomRocks(int howMany)
          Place a number of rocks into the world at random places.
 void randomSimpleWombats(int howMany)
          Place a number of simple wombats into the world at random places.
